CENTRAL REPAIR INTERFACE V0.01

  • Training software that's easy to use
    With a highly intuitive interface, Shepherd creates a distraction-free environment and makes learning a breeze. Your learners navigate through the platform easily, and access information in a snap.
  • Always available on the cloud
    No need to install, upgrade or back up anything. Shepherd is a cloud-powered training platform. 
  • Onboarding training
    First impressions matter. Welcome new hires and get them productive - all with no frustration.
MULTI USER

    To train with another user connect the *provided controller and use one of the joysticks to control the simulation.
